reviews.text: One of my favourite go-to bars in town. Love the cozy vibes and well-curated drinks here. Cocktails are consistently excellent. Used to be more of a hidden gem, but word’s gotten out so it’s a bit more crowded now. Still a great spot for a chill night out.

This stylish and traditionally inspired Singapore bar is a true hidden gem. The elegant Asian aesthetics create an inviting atmosphere, blending classic charm with a modern touch. We were pleasantly surprised by the creative and expertly crafted drinks, especially their names, each offering a unique twist on traditional flavors. The ambiance was just right—vibrant yet relaxed, with a comfortable volume of music that allowed for easy conversation. Whether you’re looking for a sophisticated night out or a cozy spot to unwind, this bar delivers an unforgettable experience. Highly recommended!

The cocktails are elevated versions of your favorite classics, presented in a new and fresh way. The bitter oddball is one of the best if not the best cocktail I have ever had. When in Singapore you must make time to stop here.

This speak easy has a unique homey atmosphere and delicious playful drinks. We came as a group of ten during happy hours between 4-10PM and the space was perfect for us to talk and laugh. On top of it all, the host, Caroline, was absolutely lovely and chill. She made us feel at home!

A hidden gem on a street with plenty of bar options.  Nice atmosphere to set the scene for delicious glasses of cocktails.  Understand more cocktail options will be added to the menu in the near future.
